text: Chevalier Michael is a 1992 Indian Malayalam film, produced and music directed by J. M. Raju, directed by PK Baburaj, starring, Anand Babu, Thilakan and Vinodini in the lead roles. http://spicyonion.com/title/police-diary- malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Thilakan as Chevalier Michael * Anand Babu as Freddy * Vinodini as Monu * Jagathy Sreekumar as Chitrangathan * Mahesh as Basheer * Suneel Puranik as Igineshious * KPAC Lalitha as Filony * Rajan P Dev as Joseph *Oduvil Unnikrishnan as Swamy * Sharmily * Kalidas as Kaali * Kiran as Vikki * Siby Kuruvila as Bhasamma * Veleen as Sisily Kutty * Priyanka as S.I Bhagyalakshmi ==References== Category:1992 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Chevalier Michael
